item.title: Email to Adam Rogalski and Mahonri Manjarrez regarding the phone call incident to the FBI
item.description: Click on this link to visualize the original email: 2023-02-15_2333_0800_email_to_adam_rogalski_and_mahonri_manjarrez_Redacted.pdf From: [Key witness/whistleblower’s name, redacted for privacy] Subject: FBI hanging up on me Date sent：2023-02-15 23:33 (Beijing time +0800) To: Mahonri Manjarrez (FBI, Language Specialist US Government), Adam Rogalski (Assistant Legal-Attaché) Cc: U.S. Ambassador Burns, U.S. Ambassador Bauer, Edward Lehman, David K. Colapinto, Yves Strickler (I will try to update this section soon) BeijingACS@state.gov and ParisExec@state.gov, please forward this email to the Legal Attaché. Thank you.

item.title: Email to Adam Rogalski. Special Agent in Charge? FBI case number? FBI Victim Specialist?
item.description: From: [Key witness/whistleblower’s name, redacted for privacy] Subject: Special Agent in Charge? FBI case number? FBI Victim Specialist? Date sent：2023-01-27 17:32 (Beijing time +0800) To: Adam Rogalski (Assistant Legal-Attaché) Cc: Mahonri Manjarrez (FBI, Language Specialist US Government), [Edward Lehman], and many more people (I will try to update this section soon) My reference for this case: USA-v-McDonalds-pattern-of-racketeering-activity Dear Mr. Rogalski, As a victim of the transnational criminal enterprise orchestrated by the criminal entity McDonald’s Corporation, I would like to ask you three questions:

item.title: Email to Adam Rogalski. Are you back Mr. Rogalski? Who is the Special Agent in Charge of the investigation?
item.description: From: [Key witness/whistleblower’s name, redacted for privacy] Subject: Are you back Mr. Rogalski? Who is the Special Agent in Charge of the investigation? Date sent：2023-01-20 15:35 (Beijing time +0800) To: Adam Rogalski (Assistant Legal-Attaché) Cc: Mahonri Manjarrez (FBI, Language Specialist US Government), [Edward Lehman] Dear Sir or Madam who will receive this email sent to BeijingACS@state.gov, please forward this email to the Legat office even though it seems that Mr. Rogalski’s email address is functional again.
